#summary How to install SchedulesDirect Plugin

= Introduction =

Simple outline of how to install the SD plugin


= Details =

  * Download the rar or zip file from this site
  * rar is a compressed file... use winrar or 7zip to uncompress it
  * stop the MediaPortal TV Service
  * Copy both DLL files into the MediaPortal TV Server\Plugins directory
  * Start the TV Service
  * Enable the SchedulesDirect plugin
